mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, ADMIN_ID, FAQ_REWRITER FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REPORT_DATE, CASE R.REPORT_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '미확인' WHEN 2 THEN '삭제' WHEN 3 THEN '반려' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS REPORT_STATUS, B.REVIEW_CONTENT, B.USER_ID, B.BIZ_ID, R.REPORT_REASON FROM REVIEW_REPORT R JOIN BIZ_REVIEW B ON R.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO ORDER BY R.REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.REPORT_DATE, CASE R.REPORT_STATUS WHEN 1 THEN '미확인' WHEN 2 THEN '삭제' WHEN 3 THEN '반려' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS REPORT_STATUS, B.REVIEW_CONTENT, B.USER_ID, B.BIZ_ID, R.REPORT_REASON FROM REVIEW_REPORT R JOIN BIZ_REVIEW B ON R.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = 2 ORDER BY R.REPORT_DATE DESC
